text: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṃ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti
edit: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṃ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti?

translations.transtext: 150. Monks, how were the four foundations of mindfulness cultivated? How do [they], having been practiced frequently, fulfill the seven factors of enlightenment?
